data.title: The Breslin and Liberty Hall at Ace Hotel New York
data.text:
The private event space, Liberty Hall, is located on the lower level of Ace Hotel New York and has a seated capacity of 120 guests and standing occupancy of 205. To accommodate smaller groups, the space can be subdivided into two or three rooms (spaces A, C, E) each with independent A/V and lighting controls.
